Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Recombination \Re*com`bi*na"tion\ (r?*k?m`b?*n?"sh?n), n. Combination a second or additional time. [1913 Webster]

recombination n 1: (genetics) a combining of genes or characters different from what they were in the parents 2: (physics) a combinng of charges or transfer of electrons in a gas that results in the neutralization of ions; important for ions arising from the passage of high-energy particles
